body.summary: Registration of new user from Create your Google account page returns to Homepage google.com
body.environment: Windows 10, Browser: Google Chrome Version 94.0.4606.81 (Official Build) (64-bit)

str.str5: Enter first name in First name input field
str.str6: Enter last name in Last name input field
str.str7: Enter username in Username ... .gmail.com input field
str.str8: Enter password in Password input field (Use 8 or more characters with a mix of letters, numbers and symbols)
str.str9: Confirm password in Confirm input field

body.actual_result: Registration of new user from Create your Google account page returns to Homepage google.com
body.expected_result: Registration of new user from Create your Google account page ends successfully
